law.catch_line: Prince George's County may not require any refund of overpayments:...
law.text:
Prince George's County may not require any refund of overpayments:
If a municipal corporation or special taxing district received overpayments under former Article 81, § 283(c) or § 323(a) of the Code (1957) or § 2-606(b) or § 2-607(a) of the Tax - General Article; and
If those overpayments were received by the municipal corporation or special taxing district before July 1, 1973, and any refund of any such overpayment made by a municipal corporation or special taxing district before July 1, 1981, shall be reimbursed to the municipal corporation or district by the Prince George's County government.
